se.kau.isgc08.lab4.view
Interface DrawingUtilInterface

All Superinterfaces:
java.io.Serializable
All Known Implementing Classes:
DrawingUtil
public interface DrawingUtilInterface
extends java.io.Serializable

The Interface DrawingUtilInterface. If you do not like the DrawingAPI provided here, use this interface to implement a new one. The DrawingShape members are depending on a DrawingUtilInterface. If you want to add shapes ad them here. Implement in DrawingUtil and add Shapes in Model.This inreface was previously called DrawingAPIInterface.
